        public static int generateIterationCount(java.lang.String salt)
        Generates the iterations to perform for this particular salt. TODO: This is a fun idea, but perhaps it is not necessary and introduces unnecessary rigidness - if we changed this, we would have to keep track of passwords on the new and the old algorithm.
        Parameters:
        salt -
        Returns:
